attributes.background: Arrest the israeli prime minister for killing innocent Palestinian...

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105446

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.

You will see from the Government's response to this petition that under UK and international law, visiting heads of foreign governments, such as Prime Minister Netanyahu, have immunity from legal process, and cannot be arrested or detained.
